definitions: Declared one's public approval or support of.
Signed on the back of (a check or bill of exchange) to make it payable to someone other than the stated payee or to cash it.
Recommended (a product or service) in an advertisement.
Wrote something on the back of (a document).
Recorded (a conviction or points) on a driver's license.
examples: The candidate was endorsed by the former president.
She endorsed the check for deposit.
A celebrity endorsed the new smartphone.
The police officer endorsed the back of the form.
His license was endorsed with six penalty points.
